column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was a tough review for me to figure out! First of all
column2: I have a huge and unwavering love for NY thin crust pizza
column3: but I promised myself to have an open mind for this. We got there around 9:30 on a Sunday night
column5: was it packed. We were told it'd be a 45-minute wait
column6: so we tried to do carry out instead. We were told it'd be 50 minutes to wait for that
column7: so we stuck to that plan. Well
column9: everyone had been seated and we regretted that choice! The staff was not very helpful and that whole process was kind of frustrating. We finally got our pizza
column10: and it was really good! It was delicious and fresh. I just wish it was easier to get!
